message: Let's start fair. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  This is a good starting point, and I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I'm not sure why you thought a 60/40 split was fair. I'll give you a better deal this time.
Let's be reasonable. I'm willing to compromise. A 45/55 split is fair considering the inflation. I'm open to discussing further if you're not happy with this.
I'm not willing to give up that much. I think I'm being generous with this offer, considering the inflation.

We're both losing money with each round, so let's find a middle ground. I'm offering a 35/65 split in your favor. It's the best I can do right now. Let's end this game and split the money before it's worth even less.
